casebody.data:
TOWN OF NAGS HEAD
v.
RICHARDSON, et al. 244A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 24, 2018 Norman W. Shearin, Attorney at Law, David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Richardson, William W., et al M.H. Hood Ellis, Attorney at Law, Benjamin Marshall Gallop, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth City, for Town of Nags Head

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of August 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of August 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 5th day of October 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
